Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "The Hall of Muses; where every individual flourishes. "

(\{ "hidden", "Welcome to The Hall of Muses. \\r\\n\\r\\nWe're here to help those who want to learn more about or develop their artistic talents, including music, acting and painting. We offer our services to Nobles and common folk alike, whether you are hosting a grand ball or a party near the sea we will surely be able to provide the musical entertainment you need. \\r\\n\\r\\nWe have various instruments that are available for guild members to use and practice on and for others to hire.\\r\\n\\r\\nIf you are interested in joining our guild, please write to Kaitlyn Beaumont. ", (\{ "members_list", "" \}), (\{ "h3", "Guild Inventory" \}), (\{ "inventory", "" \}), (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})

(\{ "visitors", "The Hall of Muses is dedicated to the promotion of the fine arts within this fine city, if you are a Musician, Artist or Actor, please feel free to contact Kaitlyn if you are interested in sharing your gifts or increasing your abilities. ", (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})
